author: sats
title: Konma Upskill
description: India being a multi-lingual country with the 2nd largest population,education about Cardano in native languages can build a strong community
solution: Konma Upskill aims to create multilingual content and provide education in a language comfortable for them in an online and offline model.
experience: The team has certified domain experts,Train the Trainers,Social Media Influencers & Content creators who can run the community collectively.
